hero.name: Tran Van Nghia
hero.title: Full Stack Developer
hero.description: I build exceptional digital experiences with modern technologies and clean code. Specialized in web applications, cloud solutions, cybersecurity, and with working knowledge of mobile development.

abouts.title: About Me
abouts.paragraph1: I'm a final-year student at the Vietnam-Korea University of Information and Communication Technology, with a strong passion for software development. During my 6-month internship, I gained practical experience working on backend systems and also explored some frontend technologies.
abouts.paragraph2: My strength lies in backend development, where I focus on building robust and maintainable server-side applications. While I have basic knowledge of frontend development, I’m most confident when working with APIs, databases, and the logic behind scalable web applications.

experiences.title: Work Experience
experiences.description: Contributed to the backend development of a SaaS application as a Django intern. Developed RESTful APIs using Django REST Framework, and participated in designing system architecture with PostgreSQL. Gained practical experience working in an Agile team using the Scrum methodology, including sprint planning and daily stand-ups.

contacts.title: Get In Touch
contacts.introText: Feel free to reach out if you're looking for a developer, have a question, or just want to connect.
